nodeList.loreText: Control is a mage's most important goal
nodeList.nodeDescription: Casts an orb in a target direction that deals lightning damage and pulls enemies that it hits towards it as it travels. At the end of its path it discharges, dealing lightning damage to enemies around it.

nodeList.description: Static Orb now explodes where you target, rather than traveling a fixed distance.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Static orb explodes where you target, rather than after travelling a fixed distance.

nodeList.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Static orb's explosion has a [33%] chance to shock per point

node.altText: {Spark Novas} scale with increases to spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.
node.description: Static Orb’s explosion leaves behind Static Ground which repeatedly casts {Spark Novas} in the area, but costs significantly more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 300% increased mana cost. The explosion from static orb leaves static ground, which repeatedly casts spark novas in a large area.

node.loreText: Control is a mage's most important goal
node.nodeDescription: Casts an orb in a target direction that deals lightning damage and pulls enemies that it hits towards it as it travels. At the end of its path it discharges, dealing lightning damage to enemies around it.

nodeList.description: Casting Static Orb has a chance to knock nearby enemies back.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [25%] chance per point to knock back nearby enemies on cast

node.altText: {Lightning Aegis} Grants 50% increased lightning damage and 25% less damage taken. Expires when you lose 25% of your health or after 10 seconds. Causes a lightning explosion on expiration.
node.description: Casting Static Orb has a chance to grant {Lightning Aegis}, which lasts 8 seconds.
node.nodeDescription: [20%] chance per point to gain lightning aegis on cast.
